A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Phenomenal score\, great cinematography\, fun movie!  It was very well done.  I was not a fan of how the story portrayed Luke Skywalker\, nor was I a fan of how powerful they made Kylo & Rey at such young inexperienced ages.  The Luke I envision would not run off to a deserted island and hide\, nor would he shirk from responsibility to help his friends.  All that said\, I enjoyed the movie and I will watch it many times.  But\, it is hard to put this in line with the previous films as it takes many stories down new paths I have trouble accepting.  However\, this is a very well done film and it will do well to engage new fans and enable Disney to keep selling tickets.
